question: Which country is known as the "Africa in miniature"?
explanation: Cameroon is known as "Africa in miniature". Cameroon well represents the geological and cultural diversity of entire Africa in a single platform. One can see all the geographical features such beaches, deserts, mountains, rainforests and savannah in a single location. Cameroon is famous for the African-native style of music-Makossa and Bikutsi. It also has a successful national African football team.
